mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_omm_order ( id, tunnel_id, type, defect_id, worker_id, work_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tunnelId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{type, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{defectId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{workerId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{workTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.name AS tunnel_name, c.name AS worker_name FROM t_omm_order a LEFT JOIN t_common_tunnel b ON a.tunnel_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_security_user c ON a.worker_id = c.id WHERE a.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}
